head.title: St. John-Hudson USD 350 - Lunch & Breakfast - School Closure

meta.content: St. John-Hudson USD 350 - Lunch & Breakfast - School Closure

The lunch and breakfast program will begin on Tuesday, March 24 th . This will be a drive through pick-up on the north side of the campus, in front of the Jr/Sr High office. We ask that you remain in the vehicle and staff will bring the meals to you. Each person that is 18 and younger and in the vehicle will receive a lunch for the day and breakfast for the next day. div.div: Your session will expire in 0 minutes.

a.title: E-mail this article to a friend.

span.span: The lunch and breakfast program will begin on Tuesday, March 24th. This will be a drive through pick-up on the north side of the campus, in front of the Jr/Sr High office. We ask that you remain in the vehicle and staff will bring the meals to you. Each person that is 18 and younger and in the vehicle will receive a lunch for the day and breakfast for the next day. Regulations state that the child must be present receive a meal. NEW AS OF APRIL 1...CHILDREN DO NOT NEED TO BE PRESENT TO RECEIVE A MEAL. PARENTS/GUARDIANS MAY PICK UP MEALS FOR THEIR CHILDREN. There is no charge for the meals.
Please follow this schedule for meal pickup:
Parent / Guardians with the last name A-F pick up at 11:30
Parent / Guardians with the last name G-H pick up at 11:45
Parent / Guardians with the last name I-M pick up at 12:00
Parent / Guardians with the last name N-Z pick up at 12:15
Parent / Guardians with the last name A-H pick up at 11:30
Parent / Guardians with the last name I-Z pick up at 11:45
We ask for your understanding as we implement this new lunch and breakfast program during the school closure. We will do our best to ensure everyone that needs a meal gets one.

Delivery will not be available this week and pick-up is only available at the school. We are working on a delivery schedule for those that live outside of the city limits and hope to have a delivery schedule next week.
Contact the office with any questions.

p.a: This institution is an equal opportunity provider.
